editors.name: stage
sprite
editors.value:
@onmouse('down', anywhere = True)
def on_clicked(self, x, y):
    self.visible = False
    self.pos = (x, y)
    
    sprite_lat = nb.google_maps.get_latitude_from_y(y)
    sprite_long = nb.google_maps.get_longitude_from_x(x)
    
    city = nb.geolocation.city(sprite_lat, sprite_long)
    temp = round(nb.weather.temperature(sprite_lat, sprite_long))
    
    self.say(f'{city}: {temp} F')
    self.costume = nb.weather.icon(sprite_lat, sprite_long)
    self.visible= True

@nb.on_message('Map Updated')
def on_map_update(self):
    self.visible = False
